User.title: User
User.description: Represents a user within the Zwitch application.

id.description: Unique identifier for the user.  This is the Firebase Authentication UID.

photoURL.description: URL of the user's profile picture.  Can be null if not set.

createdAt.description: The date and time the user account was created.

avgRating.description: The average star rating of the user based on feedback from other users.

joinDate.description: The date the user joined the platform.

itemsRecycled.description: The total number of items the user has recycled through the platform.

definition.description: Stores user profiles. The 'userId' is the Firebase Auth UID, enabling path-based ownership.

params.name: userId
params.description: The Firebase Authentication UID of the user.
